entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers late this afternoon. Snow level 1200 metres. High 11. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. 60 percent chance of flurries over northern sections overnight. Snow level 1200 metres lowering to valley bottom after midnight. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Thursday 13 April 2023
